医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
噬菌体揭示了对感染至关重要的辅助基因感染细菌的病毒（称为噬菌体）可用于有针对性地对抗细菌性疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241016/Bacteriophages-unveil-auxiliary-genes-ritic-for-infection.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241016/Bacteriophages-unveil-auxiliary-genes-ritic-for-infection.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0a181fb6-7393-4887-a70b-809aa8fc9e61 Wed, 16 Oct 2024 08:09:38 -0400 Bacteriophages unveil auxiliary genes critical for infection
确定视网膜色素变性治疗的新药物靶点一个国际研究小组已经确定了新的治疗药物靶点，可以使患有不同形式的视网膜色素变性和其他遗传性视网膜疾病的患者受益。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241016/New-drug-targets-identified-for-retinitis-pigmentosa-therapies.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241016/New-drug-targets-identified-for-retinitis-pigmentosa-therapies.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d4532984-7db5-434f-88ba-c67a95454500 Wed, 16 Oct 2024 07:57:09 -0400 New drug targets identified for retinitis pigmentosa therapies
Cellular Origins 与 Fresenius Kabi 签署细胞和基因治疗制造可扩展自动化开发协议Cellular Origins 和费森尤斯 (Fresenius) 旗下运营公司费森尤斯卡比 (Fresenius Kabi) 今天宣布，他们已签署一项开发协议，利用双方公司在细胞和基因疗法 (CGT) 方面的专业知识。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241016/Cellular-Origins-Fresenius-Kabi-sign-development-agreement-for-scalable-automation-of-cell-and-gene-therapy-manufacturing.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241016/Cellular-Origins-Fresenius-Kabi-sign-development-agreement-for-scalable-automation-of-cell-and-gene-therapy-manufacturing.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b91146d3-23bf-4ce0-bce0-bf38c40d025e Wed, 16 Oct 2024 07:40:00 -0400 Cellular Origins, Fresenius Kabi sign development agreement for scalable automation of cell and gene therapy manufacturing
Nuclera 完成 7500 万美元融资Nuclera 是一家生物技术公司，通过其台式蛋白质系统加速蛋白质表达和纯化工作流程，今天宣布已完成一轮 7500 万美元的融资（约 5700 万英镑）。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241016/Nuclera-closes-2475-million-USD-financing.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241016/Nuclera-closes-2475-million-USD-financing.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d2b487d8-aa3a-4338-86eb-000eb6d77951 Wed, 16 Oct 2024 07:36:00 -0400 Nuclera closes $75 million USD financing
转座子在人类早期发育中发挥重要作用西奈卫生中心的研究人员发现，人类早期发育的一个关键转变不是由我们自己的基因调节的，而是由称为转座子的 DNA 元件调节的，这种转座子可以在基因组中移动。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241016/Transposons-play-essential-role-in-early- human-development.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241016/Transposons-play-essential-role-in-early- human-development.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=06956c6c-fb99-4fd5-b28d-a111ad6441c0 Wed, 16 Oct 2024 07:35:50 -0400 Transposons play essential role in early human development
诱导抗性是实现可持续粮食安全的途径随着气候危机改变了我们熟悉的生长条件，我们迫切需要找到保护世界免遭饥荒的方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241016/Induced-resistance-as-a-path-to-sustainable-food-security.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241016/Induced-resistance-as-a-path-to-sustainable-food-security.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ea25cbac-2663-4cb7-aaee-5245a1a81c4a Wed, 16 Oct 2024 07:00:56 -0400 Induced resistance as a path to sustainable food security
患有多动症的年轻人受益于触觉按摩触觉按摩可以缓解多动症患者的多动、冲动和注意力缺陷。这是哥德堡大学进行的一项小规模研究的结果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241016/Young-people-with-ADHD-benefit-from-tactile-massage.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241016/Young-people-with-ADHD-benefit-from-tactile-massage.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=905c1a99-79df-41d5-901d-dd78dc2f1876 Wed, 16 Oct 2024 06:41:34 -0400 Young people with ADHD benefit from tactile massage
哈里斯支持削减医疗债务。特朗普的“概念”令拥护者感到担忧。如果卡马拉·哈里斯在下个月的总统选举中获胜，患者和消费者权益倡导者希望卡马拉·哈里斯能够加快联邦政府的努力，帮助那些陷入医疗债务困境的人们。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241016/Harris-backs-slashing-medical-debt-Trumpe28099s-e28098conceptse28099-worry-advocates.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241016/Harris-backs-slashing-medical-debt-Trumpe28099s-e28098conceptse28099-worry-advocates.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cb35f162-423b-44a1-b402-bfd0ecd4e004 Wed, 16 Oct 2024 06:36:33 -0400 Harris backs slashing medical debt. Trump’s ‘concepts’ worry advocates.
更多流动诊所正在为农村地区带来长效节育服务一辆 40 英尺长的卡车改造成移动诊所，每月两次穿越格兰德河谷，为德克萨斯州农村地区的妇女提供包括节育在内的医疗保健服务。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241016/More-mobile-clinics-are-bringing-long-acting-birth-control-to-rural-areas.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241016/More-mobile-clinics-are-bringing-long-acting-birth-control-to-rural-areas.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=16b3d459-5381-40d1-93f5-457de3020de1 Wed, 16 Oct 2024 06:35:08 -0400 More mobile clinics are bringing long-acting birth control to rural areas
研究人员开发决策树来帮助临床医生预测神经发育病例的基因诊断一项研究确定运动迟缓和肌张力低下是基因诊断的关键预测因素，有助于临床医生进行神经发育护理和基因检测决策。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241016/Researchers-develop-decision-tree-to-help-clinicians-predict-genic-diagnoses-in-neurodevelopmental-cases.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241016/Researchers-develop-decision-tree-to-help-clinicians-predict-genic-diagnoses-in-neurodevelopmental-cases.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7f073109-1b1f-43cd-b6d1-59aa8dc8a7a2 Wed, 16 Oct 2024 05:57:00 -0400 Researchers develop decision tree to help clinicians predict genetic diagnoses in neurodevelopmental cases
